text: Saint-Martin-la-Pallu is a commune in the department of Vienne, western France. The municipality was established on 1 January 2017 by merger of the former communes of Vendeuvre-du-Poitou (the seat), Blaslay, Charrais and Cheneché.Arrêté préfectoral 19 July 2016 On 1 January 2019, the former commune Varennes was merged into Saint-Martin-la-Pallu.Arrêté préfectoral 21 September 2018 == See also == *Communes of the Vienne department == References == Saintmartinlapallu
title: Saint-Martin-la-Pallu
